content:
Gleam:

- [All about Gleam](https://gleaming.dev/)
- [A library for building real-time server UI components and live views in Gleam](https://sprocket.live/)
- [👩🏾‍🍳 How to do many things in Gleam](https://github.com/gleam-lang/cookbook)
- [Simple, robust and performant Erlang web server](https://github.com/elli-lib/elli/blob/develop/doc/README.md)
- [🐘 A PostgreSQL database client for Gleam, based on PGO](https://hexdocs.pm/pgo)
- [🧚 A practical web framework for Gleam](https://gleam-wisp.github.io/wisp/)
- [A Gleam compiler written in Gleam](https://github.com/schurhammer/gig)
- [📦 Search for Gleam packages](https://packages.gleam.run/)
- []()

前端

[Nitro](https://nitro.build/)

1. [IP Geolocation API with Ultra-Fast Response Time](https://www.ipflare.io)
2. [Databases For All Applications](https://turso.tech/)
3. [Find Proven Problems Build Your Next Successful Product](https://www.bigideasdb.com/)

5. [Scrape the modern web](https://lightpanda.io/)
6. [CoralRing is an ultra-low-latency, lock-free, garbage-free, batching and concurrent circular queue (ring)](https://github.com/coralblocks/CoralRing)
7. [FIND THE NEXT BIG THING](https://huntlie.com/)
8. [Identify Reliable Suppliers and Buyers, Gain Visibility into Global Trade](https://www.trademagellan.com/)
9. [The revolutionary stock market AI](https://feetr.io/)
10. [Generate a site and share it with the world, in seconds](https://www.sitebrew.ai/)
11. [Your Code-Free Web AutomationPlayground](https://www.bytebot.ai/)
12. [Bluesky PDS (Personal Data Server) container image, compose file, and documentation](https://github.com/bluesky-social/pds)
13. [The most comprehensive authentication framework for TypeScript](https://www.better-auth.com/)
14. [Datadog Go Library including APM tracing, profiling, and security monitoring](https://docs.datadoghq.com/tracing)

明星公司：

1. [databricks](https://www.databricks.com)

Docker manual

```
sudo apt remove golang-docker-credential-helpers
```
## Login
```
docker login --username=fanrong@1451694405167915 registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com
```
## Remove unused images
```
docker image prune
```
## Remove build cache older than 24h
```
docker builder prune --filter until=24h
```

NodeJS

```
npm create astro@latest --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
```
晚上还是休息不好，醒得太早了，😣

巨大压力的时候，怎么释放一部分压力。
以后的游戏，极大可能是由 AI 实时生成游戏场景。
每周推进一个自己的新项目。
好好做，一步步完成既定目标
怎么学会去享受每一天。
咳嗽...
记住，你是一个赌徒。并且，绝大多数时候，都赌输；其次，整体也是输的。
尝试用 Sublime 代替 Visual Studio Code。
有效的审计日志，非常有帮助。如果有工具能辅助补充，就非常 nice 。
订单回调通知，需要多仔细考虑，比如重试机制会不会造成服务过载等等。
用 Volo 对接 Stripe，实现一个支付系统，上手练习。
尝试用下 CloudWeGo 的 Volo 框架。
计划构建一个通用用户系统和一个通用支付系统。
